en.title: Healing Music
en.description: Music playlists and tracks designed for relaxation, meditation, and emotional healing.

items.title: Deep Sleep Meditation Music
items.description: Calming instrumental music designed to promote deep, restful sleep. Features gentle piano melodies, soft nature sounds, and ambient textures that help quiet the mind and prepare the body for sleep. Perfect for bedtime routines and overcoming insomnia.

items.title: Anxiety Relief & Calm
items.description: Specially curated music collection for anxiety relief and emotional regulation. Combines binaural beats, soft classical music, and nature sounds to help reduce anxiety symptoms and promote a sense of calm. Based on music therapy research for anxiety management.

items.title: Mindfulness Meditation Sounds
items.description: A comprehensive collection of sounds for mindfulness meditation practice. Includes guided meditation music, Tibetan singing bowls, rain sounds, and forest ambience. Designed to support various meditation techniques and mindfulness exercises.

items.title: Emotional Healing Journey
items.description: A carefully crafted musical journey for emotional healing and processing. Combines therapeutic frequencies, gentle melodies, and healing sounds to support emotional release and recovery. Suitable for therapy sessions, self-reflection, and emotional wellness practices.
